ASSOCIATION FOR EDUCATION BY RAMO-TELEVISION
Office of the President
Boston, Massachusetts
February 29, 1956
I believe this gets ns up to date on the materials which we have been intend¬
ing to send you. Now that we have adequate assistance in this office, I believe
we will be able to service you with membership materials without any unnecessary
delays.
If I can be of further assistance, please let me know.
John Adams Rourk©
National Membership Chairman
AERT
5 encs
